name: part_007
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY2】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [LgyXzn0k0MA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Display of official items for hololive SUPER EXPO 2022, including clear files, acrylic dioramas, playing cards, and pamphlets.
Display of special limited items produced by MANGART BEAMS, featuring apparel like coach jackets, crew sweats, and T-shirts.
Important venue rules and guidelines (Attention) for attendees regarding masks, phone use, and behavior during the event.
Advertisement for Weiβ Schwarz Premium Booster hololive Production and Bushiroad card accessories.
Showcasing trading card collections (vol.1 - vol.7) for hololive SUPER EXPO 2022.
Display of VOYZ ENTERTAINMENT items including plate acrylic stands and tapestries.
Merchandise from Chugai Mining, featuring waterproof stickers, cans, and hand towels.
Repeated display of the 'Attention' slides with venue rules.
Key visual for 'hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish' Day 2.
Official merchandise for 'hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish', including penlights and apparel.
A comprehensive list of official penlight colors for each hololive member.
Further official items including windbreakers, bags, cushions, and tapestries.
